Want to know more about

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”f0b17bce-2959-4c3c-90b7-8c28a8aac175″ text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#0a0909″ text_font_size=”62px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px|31px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|0px||0px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”40px” text_font_size_phone=”46px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”font-family: ‘Impact Label’;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Rough Sex & Choking?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#414143″ text_font_size=”38px” text_line_height=”1em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||-2px||false|false” custom_padding=”33px|38px||38px|false|true” text_text_color_last_edited=”off|desktop” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”28px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”font-family: %22trashhand%22;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Hey there!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”44a5c643-4e1c-4478-b397-266b3936250c” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”23px|70px||35px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|0px||0px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|0px|||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”18px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you’re watching rougher sex in porn and are wondering about trying it out; you want
to know more about choking; or have been in a tricky rough sex situation
you’re in the right place! The rough stuff in porn is just fantasy – but when people try
it out in real life, things can sometimes get tricky. So before diving into anything,
it’s good to have the full lowdown….

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||175px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.intheknow.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/rs-tile.jpg” title_text=”rs-tile” url=”/rough-sex/” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”104%|104%” transform_rotate__hover=”0deg|0deg|-4deg”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.intheknow.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/ck-tile.jpg” title_text=”ck-tile” url=”/choking” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”104%|104%” transform_rotate__hover=”0deg|0deg|-4deg”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

The rough stuff in porn is just fantasy – but when people try […]
